Races

The Starfinder Roleplaying Game is about more than just meeting aliens—it’s also about playing alien characters. In Starfinder, the word “race” usually refers to an intelligent, selfaware species whose members can be considered characters rather than simple monsters. While not all races are appropriate for player characters, many of them are; any creature with a racial traits entry is a member of a potentially playable race, provided that your GM approves it.

Core Races

This group outlines the “core races” of Starfinder—those most common in the Pact Worlds and intended for use as PCs.
Android | Human | Kasatha | Lashunta | Shirren | Vesk | Ysoki

Other Races

This group consists of all other races playable in Starfinder, though whether or not they may be appropriate for your campaign is up to your GM.
Aasimar | Amrantah | Anassanoi | Astrazoan | Bantrid | Barathu (Early Stage) | Bear (Uplifted) | Bolida | Borai | Brakim | Brenneri | Cephalume | Contemplative | Copaxi | Damai | Dirindi | Draelik | Dragonkin | Dromada | Drow | Dwarf | Elebrian | Elf | Embri | Endiffian | Espraksa | Ferran | Formian | Ghibrani | Ghoran | Gnome | Goblin (Space) | Gosclaw | Gray | Haan | Half-Elf | Halfling | Half-Orc | Hanakan | Hobgoblin | Hortus | Ifrit | Ijtikri | Ikeshti | Ilthisarian | Imago | Instar | Izalguun | Kalo | Kanabo | Kayal | Khizar | Kiirinta | Kish | Maraquoi | Megalonyxa | Morlamaw | Neskinti | Nuar | Orc | Oread | Osharu | Pahtra | Phentomite | Quorlu | Ramiyel | Raxilite | Reptoid | Ryphorian | Sarcesian | Sazaron | Screedreep | Scyphozoan | Selamid | Seprevoi | Shakatla | Shatori | Shimreen | Shobhad | Skittermander | Spathinae | SRO | Stellifera | Strix | Suli | Svartalfar | Sylph | Telia | Tiefling | Trinir | Trox | Undine | Urog | Varculak | Verthani | Vilderaro | Vlaka | Witchwyrd | Woioko | Wrikreechee
